name: Hero Must Die (Orkbadger)
description:
Play as the super orc soldier of a beaten down evil army. Kill your way to the hero in a magical maze castle.
W,A,S,D to move.
Left Mouse Button to hit.
Space to dodge.
This is a game I made by myself from scratch in all areas with a time frame of 3 days for Mağara Jam #5. The theme was "Bad guy is you", usually you have knight that kills orcs and I reversed that idea. Here you play as the orc after the Hero's story ended and they have won. You fight to prevent their happy ending.  Hope you'll enjoy it.Team :
Developer - Ahmet Orkun Yazıcıoğlu.
